title: Can a debt collector ask to see my bank statements in order to set up a payment arragement?
question: can a debt collector ask to see my bank statements in order to set up a payment arragement?
answers: Sure- you can ask for anything. Do not give him this information, as he then can possibly draft your account or garnish it all. ( You are telling him where he can get YOUR money.) Go see a California attorney to discuss your options- I'm a FL atty and am of no real help to you
